00032 class StateServer : public QMCalculator
00033 {
00034 public:
00035 
00036     StateServer() { };
00037    ~StateServer() { };
00038 
00039     string Identify() { return "State Server"; }
00040 
00041     void Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options);
00042     bool EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);

00044     void DownloadTopology(FILE *out, Topology *top);
00045     void DownloadSegments(FILE *out, Topology *top);

00047     void DownloadEList(FILE *out, Topology *top);
00048     void DownloadIList(FILE *out, Topology *top);
00049     void DownloadCoords(FILE *out, Topology *top) { };
00050 
00051 private:
00052

00054     string _pdbfile;

00059 
00060 void StateServer::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00061     
00062     string tag = "options.stateserver";
00063 
00064     // Tabular output
00065     if ( opt->exists(tag+".out") ) {
00066         _outfile = opt->get(tag+".out").as< string > ();
00067     }
00068     else {
00069         _outfile = "stateinfo.out";
00070     }
00071     // PDB output
00072     if ( opt->exists(tag+".pdb") ) {
00073         _pdbfile = opt->get(tag+".pdb").as< string > ();
00074     }
00075     else {
00076         _pdbfile = "system.pdb";
00077     }
00078 
00079     string keys = "";
00080     if ( opt->exists(tag+".keys") ) {
00081         keys = opt->get(tag+".keys").as< string > ();
00082     }
00083 
00084     Tokenizer tok_keys(keys, " ");
00085     tok_keys.ToVector(_keys);
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool StateServer::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00090 
00091     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00092     // Topology - Sites - Pairs //
00093     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00094 
00095     vector< string > ::iterator key;    
00096     bool writeTrajectory = false;
00097     
00098     string outfile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())+ "_"
00099                      + _outfile;
00100 
00101 
00102     FILE *out = NULL;
00103     out = fopen(outfile.c_str(), "w");
00104     for (key = _keys.begin(); key < _keys.end(); key++ ) {
00105 
00106         cout << endl << "... ... Write " << flush;
00107 
00108         if (*key == "topology") {
00109 
00110                 cout << "topology, ";
00111 
00112                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00113                 fprintf(out, "           # MD|QM Topology Info # \n");
00114                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00115 
00116                 DownloadTopology(out, top);
00117         }
00118         else if (*key == "sites") {
00119 
00120                 cout << endl << "sites, ";
00121 
00122                 fprintf(out, "           # ++++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00123                 fprintf(out, "           # Segments in Database # \n");
00124                 fprintf(out, "           # ++++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00125 
00126                 DownloadSegments(out, top);
00127         }
00128 
00129         else if (*key == "pairs") {
00130 
00131                 cout << endl << "pairs, ";
00132 
00133                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00134                 fprintf(out, "           # Pairs in Database # \n");
00135                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00136 
00137                 DownloadPairs(out, top);
00138 
00139         }
00140 
00141         else if (*key == "ilist") {
00142 
00143                 cout << endl << "integrals, ";
00144 
00145                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00146                 fprintf(out, "           # Integrals in Database # \n");
00147                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00148 
00149                 DownloadIList(out, top);
00150 
00151         }
00152 
00153         else if (*key == "elist") {
00154 
00155                 cout << endl << "energies, ";
00156 
00157                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++++++ # \n");
00158                 fprintf(out, "           # Site energies in Database # \n");
00159                 fprintf(out, "           # +++++++++++++++++++++++++ # \n\n");
00160 
00161                 DownloadEList(out, top);
00162 
00163         }
00164 
00165         else {
00166                 cout << "ERROR (Invalid key " << *key << ") ";
00167         }
00168 
00169         cout << "done. " << flush;
00170 
00171         fprintf(out, "\n\n");
00172     }
00173     fclose(out);
00174 
00175 
00176     if (writeTrajectory) {
00177 
00178     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
00179     // MD, QM Coordinates //
00180     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
00181         // Segments
00182         string pdbfile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00183                          + "_conjg_" + _pdbfile;
00184 
00185         out = fopen(pdbfile.c_str(), "w");
00186         top->WritePDB(out);
00187         fclose(out); 
00188 
00189 
00190         // Fragments
00191         pdbfile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00192                          + "_rigid_" + _pdbfile;
00193 
00194         out = fopen(pdbfile.c_str(), "w");
00195         vector<Segment*> ::iterator segIt;
00196         for (segIt = top->Segments().begin();
00197              segIt < top->Segments().end();
00198              segIt++) {
00199             Segment *seg = *segIt;
00200             seg->WritePDB(out);
00201         }
00202         fclose(out);
00203 
00204     }
00205 
00206 }
00207 
00208 void StateServer::DownloadTopology(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00209 
00210     fprintf(out, "Topology Database ID %3d \n", top->getDatabaseId());
00211     fprintf(out, "  Periodic Box: %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f | %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f "
00212                  "| %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f \n",
00213             top->getBox().get(0,0),
00214             top->getBox().get(0,1),
00215             top->getBox().get(0,2),
00216             top->getBox().get(1,0),
00217             top->getBox().get(1,1),
00218             top->getBox().get(1,2),
00219             top->getBox().get(2,0),
00220             top->getBox().get(2,1),
00221             top->getBox().get(2,2) );
00222 
00223     fprintf(out, "  Step number %7d \n", top->getStep());
00224     fprintf(out, "  Time          %2.3f \n", top->getTime());
00225     fprintf(out, "  # Molecules %7d \n", top->Molecules().size());
00226     fprintf(out, "  # Segments  %7d \n", top->Segments().size());
00227     fprintf(out, "  # Atoms     %7d \n", top->Atoms().size());
00228     fprintf(out, "  # Pairs     %7d \n", top->NBList().size());
00229     
00230 }
00231 
00232 void StateServer::DownloadSegments(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00233 
00234     vector< Segment* > ::iterator segit;
00235 
00236     for (segit = top->Segments().begin();
00237             segit < top->Segments().end();
00238             segit++) {
00239 
00240         Segment *seg = *segit;
00241         fprintf(out, "SiteID %5d %5s | xyz %8.3f %8.3f %8.3f "
00242                      "| SiteE(intra) C %2.4f A %2.4f "
00243                      "| Lambdas: NC %2.4f CN %2.4f NA %2.4f AN %2.4f "
00244                      "| SiteE(pol+estat) C %2.4f N %2.4f A %2.4f     \n",
00245                 seg->getId(),
00246                 seg->getName().c_str(),
00247                 seg->getPos().getX(),
00248                 seg->getPos().getY(),
00249                 seg->getPos().getZ(),
00250                 seg->getU_cC_nN(1),
00251                 seg->getU_cC_nN(-1),
00252                 seg->getU_nC_nN(1),
00253                 seg->getU_cN_cC(1),
00254                 seg->getU_nC_nN(-1),
00255                 seg->getU_cN_cC(-1),
00256                 seg->getEMpoles(1),
00257                 seg->getEMpoles(0),
00258                 seg->getEMpoles(-1) );
00259     }
00260 }
00261 
00262 void StateServer::DownloadPairs(FILE *out, Topology *top) {
00263     QMNBList::iterator nit;
00264 
00265     for (nit = top->NBList().begin();
00266          nit != top->NBList().end();
00267          nit++) {
00268 
00269         QMPair *pair = *nit;
00270 
00271         int ghost;
00272         if (pair->HasGhost()) { ghost = 1; }
00273         else { ghost = 0; }
00274 
00275         fprintf(out, "PairID %5d  | Seg1 %4d Seg2 %4d dR %2.4f PBC? %1d | "
00276                      "lOuter %1.4f J2 %1.8f r12 %2.4f r21 %2.4f \n",
00277                 pair->getId(),
00278                 pair->first->getId(),
00279                 pair->second->getId(),
00280                 pair->Dist(),
00281                 ghost,
00282                 0.0, // pair->getLambdaO(),
00283                 0.0, // pair->calcJeff2(),
00284                 0.0, // pair->getRate12(),
00285                 0.0 ); // pair->getRate21() );
00286     }
00287 }
